${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ForgetfulStrike.NAME: Forgetful Strike
${modID}:ForgetfulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random card in your deck.

${modID}:Nothing.NAME: Sorry Nothing
${modID}:Nothing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:Normalcy.NAME: Normalmancy
${modID}:Normalcy.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a Normality to your hand.

${modID}:Panik.NAME: Panik
${modID}:Panik.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, add !M! Panic Buttons to your draw pile.

${modID}:ThisIsFine.NAME: This is Fine
${modID}:ThisIsFine.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each Burn in your deck. ( !B! Block.) NL Draw a card for each Burn in your hand.

${modID}:RushedStrike.NAME: Rushed Strike
${modID}:RushedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Only playable in the first !M! seconds of combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Only playable in the first !M! seconds of combat. NL (

${modID}:GremlinWheel.NAME: Spin the Wheel!!!
${modID}:GremlinWheel.DESCRIPTION: Spin the Gremlin Wheel. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FireBreathingOld.NAME: Fire Breathing
${modID}:FireBreathingOld.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack played this turn.

${modID}:BestOffense.NAME: The Best Offense
${modID}:BestOffense.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy doesn't intend to attack, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Regretful.NAME: Dark Bargain
${modID}:Regretful.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At some point, wish you had never played this card.

${modID}:Splash.NAME: Splash
${modID}:Splash.DESCRIPTION: Do nothing. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:YataGarasu.NAME: Yata-Garasu
${modID}:YataGarasu.DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Deal !D! damage. If the enemy took unblocked damage, Stun it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:YataGarasu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Deal !D! damage. If the enemy took unblocked damage, Stun it.

${modID}:UnlimitedForm.NAME: Unlimited Form(at)
${modID}:UnlimitedForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL All dumbcards:Banned, dumbcards:Limited and Unplayable cards can be played.
${modID}:UnlimitedForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All dumbcards:Banned, dumbcards:Limited and Unplayable cards can be played.

${modID}:PotOfGreed.NAME: Pot of Greed
${modID}:PotOfGreed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Limited. NL Exhaust the top 10 cards of your Draw Pile. NL Draw 2 cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Exhaust the top 10 cards of your Draw Pile. NL Draw 2 cards.

${modID}:GrandestFinale.NAME: Grandest Finale
${modID}:GrandestFinale.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no cards in your draw pile, discard pile, or other cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ChaosEmperorDragon.NAME: Chaos Emperor Dragon
${modID}:ChaosEmperorDragon.DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Lose 10 HP. NL Exhaust all cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ChaosEmperorDragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Limited. NL Lose 10 HP. NL Exhaust all cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: dumbcards:Banned. NL Lose 10 HP. NL Exhaust all cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BlastIt.NAME: Sound System
${modID}:BlastIt.DESCRIPTION: Gain 0 - 3 Strength, based on your Master Volume. If you turn down your Volume, lose this Strength.
${modID}:BlastIt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 0 - 5 Strength, based on your Master Volume. If you turn down your Volume, lose this Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain 0 - 3 Strength, based on your Master Volume. If you turn down your Volume, lose this Strength. NL ( +
Gain 0 - 5 Strength, based on your Master Volume. If you turn down your Volume, lose this Strength. NL ( +

${modID}:LookAtThisNet.NAME: Look at this Net
${modID}:LookAtThisNet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength this turn only. NL Gain dumbcards:Entangled.

${modID}:Cheater.NAME: Cheater
${modID}:Cheater.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Cheat out the next card you play this turn (Can be played, no matter what.) NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Cheater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cheat out the next card you play this turn (Can be played, no matter what.) NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
${modID}:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If all other cards in your hand cannot be played, discard your hand and draw that many cards + 1. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Mulligan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If all other cards in your hand cannot be played, discard your hand and draw that many cards + 1.

${modID}:GoldenNeedle.NAME: Golden Needle
${modID}:GoldenNeedle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, gain !M! gold.

${modID}:Thonk.NAME: Think
${modID}:Thonk.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL If you are Confused, gain !B! block and remove Confused.

${modID}:Oven.NAME: Oven
${modID}:Oven.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Frost. NL Add !M! Burns to your hand. NL Become Confused.

${modID}:Death.NAME: Death
${modID}:Death.DESCRIPTION: 50% chance to kill an enemy. NL dumbcards:Status_Effect

${modID}:Paralysis.NAME: Paralysis
${modID}:Paralysis.DESCRIPTION: Stun an enemy. NL Exhaust. NL dumbcards:Status_Effect

${modID}:LifeSupport.NAME: Life Support
${modID}:LifeSupport.DESCRIPTION: You cannot die for the next !M! turns.

${modID}:PlotArmor.NAME: Plot Armor
${modID}:PlotArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can only be played if you have 5 or less Health.

${modID}:PlayTheUnplayable.NAME: Play The Unplayable
${modID}:PlayTheUnplayable.DESCRIPTION: When you play an Unplayable card, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:KeywordSoup.NAME: Keyword Soup
${modID}:KeywordSoup.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Retain. Ethereal. NL Randomly add a Shiv, *Miracle, *Insight or *Smite to your hand. NL Channel and Evoke 1 Lightning. NL Enter Calm. NL Gain 3 Mantra. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:KeywordSoup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Retain. Ethereal. NL Randomly add a Shiv, *Miracle, *Insight or *Smite to your hand. NL Channel and Evoke 1 Lightning. NL Enter Calm. NL Gain 3 Mantra. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RunAway.NAME: Run Away
${modID}:RunAway.DESCRIPTION: Escape from a non-boss combat. Receive no rewards.

${modID}:ForgottenD12.NAME: Forgotten D12
${modID}:ForgottenD12.DESCRIPTION: If your HP is full, gain [E] at the start of each turn.
${modID}:ForgottenD12.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If your HP is full, gain [E] at the start of each turn.

${modID}:Tribbles.NAME: Tribbles
${modID}:Tribbles.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 2 Tribbles to your draw pile.

${modID}:NoThoughts.NAME: No Thoughts
${modID}:NoThoughts.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, gain !M! Block if you have no cards in your hand.

${modID}:SnakeEyes.NAME: Snake Eyes
${modID}:SnakeEyes.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL "Randomize" the cost of cards in your hand.
${modID}:SnakeEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw 2 cards. NL "Randomize" the cost of cards in your hand.

${modID}:Alpha.NAME: Alpha
${modID}:Alpha.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Beta into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Alpha.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle a #yBeta into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Beta2.NAME: Beta
${modID}:Beta2.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Gamma into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Gamma.NAME: Gamma
${modID}:Gamma.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Delta into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Delta.NAME: Delta
${modID}:Delta.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Eplison into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Eplison.NAME: Eplison
${modID}:Eplison.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Zeta into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Zeta.NAME: Zeta
${modID}:Zeta.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Eta into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Eta.NAME: Eta
${modID}:Eta.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Theta into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Theta.NAME: Theta
${modID}:Theta.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Iota into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Iota.NAME: Iota
${modID}:Iota.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Kappa into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Kappa.NAME: Kappa
${modID}:Kappa.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Lambda into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Lambda.NAME: Lambda
${modID}:Lambda.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Mu into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Mu.NAME: Mu
${modID}:Mu.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Nu into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Nu.NAME: Nu
${modID}:Nu.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Xl into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Xl.NAME: Xl
${modID}:Xl.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Omikron into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Omikron.NAME: Omikron
${modID}:Omikron.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Pi into your Draw Pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PizzaTime.NAME: Pizza Time
${modID}:PizzaTime.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Pizza into your discard pile. You have 30 seconds to deliver it! NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Pizza.NAME: Pizza
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Heal 10 HP. NL Exhaust. NL Only playable if delievered within 30 seconds! NL (

${modID}:Equation.NAME: Equation
${modID}:Equation.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage, where -10<=X<=30. Equation changes each turn.
